title: Rocket and pineapple salad
ingredients: ['Salad', '80g rocket leaves', '1/4 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and chopped', '1/4 red onion, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped coriander', 'Salad dressing', '3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 teaspoons maple syrup', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
